name: Drive Airplane Simulator 3D Free
description:
Jumbo aeroplane simulator is a unique game for flying lovers. Now you can simulate your flying skills with a variety of airplanes and quadcopters so download jumbo aeroplane simulator today and grab a real flying fun. Jumbo aeroplane simulator has a variety of modes and environments to fly. Let's fly your desire copter in a city with high buildings, a real desert and in a jungle covered with green trees and high mountains. Beside a various environments jumbo airplane gives you chance to fly with multiple modes. Fly heli to takeoff from runway or to land your plan in an airport. In fly around mode you have to follow a circles or rings to reach a destination and in free fly mode you can fly heli without any mission. Let's fly to simulate your flying skills with jumbo aeroplane simulator and avoid to crash or to hit with high mountains.
Features:
Real simulation of flying aeroplane. Excellent controlling with smooth GUI. Elegant graphics with hd effects. Easy to fly and control. Loads of environment and flying modes. Variety of planes to simulate flying skills. Excellent desert view and sound effects.
